prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A black ribbed knit crop top featuring a classic scoop neck and sleeveless design. The front displays a prominent red, seemingly distressed or split, heart graphic, overlaid with elegant white script text. Along the lower left side seam, the brand name "STYLE&CULTURE" is printed vertically in white.
prompt_boosters: Maintain ribbed knit texture throughout the garment.
Ensure the red distressed heart graphic is centered on the chest.
Accurately render the white script text over the heart graphic.
Preserve the vertical white "STYLE&CULTURE" text on the left side seam.
Keep the scoop neck and sleeveless design consistent.
Avoid altering the cropped length of the top.
